member.name: T:TenTec.Windows.iGridLib.iGrid
member.summary: Represents an iGrid.NET grid control which allows you to display and edit tabular data. This is the core class that represents 10Tec Grid for .NET.

member.name: M:TenTec.Windows.iGridLib.iGrid.DrawRowHdrGlyph(System.Drawing.Graphics,TenTec.Windows.iGridLib.iGRowHdrGlyph,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Draws the specified standard row header glyph on the specified graphics surface.
member.param: The graphics surface to drawn on.
The glyph to be drawn.
The X-coordinate of the area where the glyph will be drawn. The glyph will be drawn in the center of this area. If the area is smaller than the glyph, the glyph will be cropped.
The y-coordinate of the area where the glyph will be drawn. The glyph will be drawn in the center of this area. If the area is smaller than the glyph, the glyph will be cropped.
The width of the area where the glyph will be drawn. The glyph will be drawn in the center of this area. If the area is smaller than the glyph, the glyph will be cropped.
The height of the area where the glyph will be drawn. The glyph will be drawn in the center of this area. If the area is smaller than the glyph, the glyph will be cropped.

The X-coordinate of the area where to draw the group box.
The Y-coordinate of the area where to draw the group box.
The width of the area where to draw the group box.
The height of the area where to draw the group box.
Determines the color to draw the lines and borders in the group box with. If this parameter is , the lines and borders are drawn by using group box colors.
Indicates whether to draw the group box background.
Determines whether to draw the background of the column headers in the group box.
Determines whether to draw the system background (3D, Flat, or XP) of the column headers in the group box.
Indicates whether to force to draw the sort info flat regardless of its real appearance. The sort info is an arrow indicating the sort order of the column.
Specifies whether to draw the combo button.
Specifies whether to draw the X-button.

Indicates whether to adjust drawing for printer. If you pass True to this parameter, the grid will not use the OS visual styles (as they are not drawn correctly on paper), will scale images according to the printer DPI, etc.

member.name: M:TenTec.Windows.iGridLib.iGColHdrCollection.FromPoint(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Retrieves the column header that is located at the specified coordinates. The coordinates are relative to the upper left corner of the grid.
member.param: The X-coordinate of the point for which to retrieve the column header.
The Y-coordinate of the point for which to retrieve the column header.
member.returns: An object that represents the column header at the specified point, or null (Nothing in VB) if there is no column header.

The Y-coordinate of the point for which to retrieve the column header.
The bounds of the retrieved column header.
member.returns: An object that represents the column header at the specified point, or null (Nothing in VB) if there is no column header.

member.summary: Gets or sets the background color of the column header.
member.value: The color of the column header's background. The default is which means that the style is not attached to the column header or the style's property is not specified and the property value is obtained from the property of the style attached to the column (the property of the column).

member.returns: True if the current cell was moved (there was a matching cell ahead); otherwise, False.

member.name: M:TenTec.Windows.iGridLib.iGSearchAsType.GoPrev
member.summary: Moves the current cell to the previous cell which matches the search criteria.
member.returns: True if the current cell was moved (there was a matching cell before); otherwise, False.

member.summary: The scroll bar is never visible. If a scroll bar is never visible, the cells cannot be scrolled by the user. For example if the Visibility of the vertical scroll bar is set to Hide, the user will never be able to scroll the cells vertically, but there is still ability to scroll the cell programmatically.

member.summary: Do not show the combo button in a combo box cell (with the type and a drop-down control attached to it by using the property of the cell style). When this flag is specified, the cell can still be edited with the drop-down control by pressing the F4 key. Also the drop-down control can be used for the auto-complete functionality.
